title: General
fullText:
All switchboards shall be installed in accordance with AS/NZS 3000.
All switchboards shall be readily accessible and protected from damage during the course of the construction or demolition work.
Every switchboard or part of a switchboard that is supplied from a separate source of supply shall be legibly and indelibly marked to identify the source of supply from which it originates.
NOTE: If the source of supply is a generating set, a unique identifier such as the plant number of the generating set satisfies this requirement.
